column4: Hi can someone help me delete one version of linux, i dont know how it came on, but it doesnt work. I think it came on while updating. I cannot use it. Here are some screenshots! oh 2.6.32-24 is the broken one : http://jurl.tk/?LJNXZ http://jurl.tk/?VVPZG

Hi can someone help me delete one version  2.6.32-24 of linux, I think it came on while updating, but I cannot use it (it gives an error). Does anyone here know how to remove it from the boot loader? . Here are some screenshots! oh 2.6.32-24 is the broken one : http://jurl.tk/?LJNXZ http://jurl.tk/?VVPZG
you can uninstall it from synaptic manager
